problem.script:
from __future__ import division from loncapa import *
a = "sqrt(5*G*m1/(4*r1))"
problem.p: A spherical non-rotating planet (with no atmosphere) has mass \(m1\) and radius \(r1\) . A projectile of mass \(m2<< m1\) is fired from the surface of the planet at a point A with a speed \(v_A\) at an angle \(\theta=30\) with respect to the radial direction. In its subsequent trajectory the projectile reaches a maximum altitude at point B on the sketch. The distance from the center of the planet to the point B is \(r_2=(5 / 2)r_1\).
Find the initial speed \(v_A\) in terms of \(G\), \(m1\), and \(r1\).
